optionsWithArgs

public java.lang.String[] optionsWithArgs()
Description copied from class: CommonCLI
returns an array of Strings that represent the options (command-line arguments) that have arguments. It is assumed that there is only one argument per option.

Specified by:
optionsWithArgs in class CommonCLI
Returns:
an array of Strings that are the options that have arguments.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
The main function of TRminatorCLI is to provide a command-line interface for creating HTML tables, in files, from XML Data Models, like those made by the BBF.

Parameters:
args - - command-line arguments.
